Personally, when I started this game I expected more, based on its sample images and opinions I had heard: graphics, environments and monsters feel outdated for today's standards and not in a good way as with cult-classic games like Doom (it does originate from an Unreal Tournament 2004 mod after all), however the more I played it the more it grew on me!
If I had to say what makes this game good, since I still stand my ground regarding what I said above about its overall feeling, I would name 3 things: weapons, achievements and online co-op fun!
The variety of weapons in this game is amazing, maybe the greatest I've found in an online game, you can really find many kinds of modern and old, existing or non, weapons (maybe it's a bit lacking if you are expecting many futuristic or alien-like weapons, like the ones in Halo, Doom 3 or Unreal Tournament, but its array of "traditional" weapons is really impressive), with new weapons being added each year as DLCs.
The achievements, much like the weapons, are not only many and fun to obtain, but increase each year with the so called "events" (there are mainly 3: summer, halloween and christmas), periods in which specific achievements can be obtained, adding to the replay factor.
Last but not least, at heart Killing Floor remains a fun co-op game, while maybe not as fun and popular as the Left 4 Dead games, killing monsters with other real players is always a nice experience!

This game is like L4D, but instead of fighting zombies in the Eastern U.S, you're fighting mutated experiments on the Island of Great Britain.
You can either complete objectives, or just kill Specimens for the hell of it.
While you can play alone, it's more fun w/ friends and other players, it requires more skill than the average survival shooter, and it rewards you if you're a nice shot.
W/ dozens of player models, constant update, and clear care by the devs, if you like team work, this game bunches it into a game that can be enjoyed even more if you play with friends, and if you have to play alone, the game balances itself out for you, making a title you shouldn't want to miss.

Spectacular Cooperative Shooter Zombie game! Its filled with tons of exciting new contents every Summer, Halloween and Christmas! Perks are classes and there are only 6 Player classes mean you can easily adjust your playing style if its not working. Slashing your way with a melee weapon as a Berserker, burning the Specimens as a Firebug, you want to blow some explosives? sure you can be a Demolition! You want to do some headshots, pistols or sniping? Be a Sharpshooter! You can mow them down using a Shotgun or Wield the door to trap your teammates as a Support Specialist! Tired of not seeing Stalkers, want to see how much of any specimens have health bar left? lead your comrades to victorious? be a Commando! Lastly, are you in a pain that your teammates is always dying in the middle of the fight and you really want to help them and heal them? be a Field Medic! 

There are lots of fire arms in this game regarding DLC's weapons, tag along with your friends to battle in the open field map, fending off against the specimens horde until the Patriarch appeared in the last hour...

Rated: 9.5/10

Одна из лучших игр про зомби. Есть два режима: Прохождение и Обычный
В Прохождении всего 2 официальные карты, но довольно таки не плохие.
В Обычном режиме карт очень много, на любой вкус. Так же большое количество оружия и еще можно купить дополнительное оружие если старое надоест :D Ну в принципе игра заслуживает хорошей оценки.
